snippet.title: Train Simulator 2015 - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out this gameplay trailer for Train Simulator 2015 showcasing its fleet of new trains and the upcoming TS Academy mode.

Visit all of our channels:
Features & Reviews - http://www.youtube.com/user/gamespot

Trailers - http://www.youtube.com/user/gamespottrailers
Mobile Gaming - http://www.youtube.com/user/gamespotmobile
